headline: Boeing Stock Falls Below This Crucial Level As FAA Grounds MD-11 Jets
summary: On Saturday, the FAA issued an order to ground all MD-11 planes while the crash is investigated. An MD-11 operated by United Parcel Service crashed last Wednesday.

headline: British Airways owner threatens to shift investment to Madrid amid Heathrow row
summary: The chief executive of British Airways (BA) has warned that its Spanish owner could ditch investment in Heathrow if the bill for the airport’s third runway is too high.

headline: Arcline Investment Management to Acquire Novaria Group
summary: Arcline Investment Management ("Arcline"), a growth-oriented private equity firm, announced it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Novaria Group ("Novaria" or "the Company"), a leading provider of engineered aerospace components and specialty processes, in an all-cash transaction with a total enterprise value of approximately $2.2 billion.

headline: Diageo taps former Tesco boss 'Drastic Dave' Lewis to lead fightback
summary: Former Tesco boss Sir Dave Lewis is to become the new chief executive of Diageo, the struggling FTSE 100 drinks giant.  The world's largest spirits maker, which counts Guinness and Johnnie Walker whisky among its stable of brands, said he would assume the role in January.  The search for a new boss began in July when Debra Crew was effectively ousted after two years in charge.
